properties.areaDesc: Big Island Southeast Waters; Big Island Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 9:23AM HST until January 19 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt becoming northeast tonight. Seas
building to 8 to 10 feet tonight.

* WHERE...Big Island Leeward Waters and Big Island Southeast
Waters.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 25 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or greater are expected to produce conditions
hazardous to small craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially
those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY
